author: cmlenz
msg: Added further means to loosen the forced 'nested-ness' of the JSTL-based
taglib, by allowing users to specify which scoped variable should be used
as a base. This should also feature better performs, as it is no longer
necessary to search through the list of parent tags etc. However, this is

author: cmlenz
msg: Added new tags 'setDomain' and 'setNamespace' that are functionally
equivalent to the tags 'domain' and 'namespace', but expose the scripting
variables after closing the tag instead of only in the body of the tag.
This pattern is used in JSTL as well (see 'bundle' vs. 'setBundle'), so I
thought it'd be a good idea. It can improve readability of the JSP source
